Class Tile

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsoftware.ll13.model.tiles.tiles_objects.Tile
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BatteryStorageTile, CabinTile, CannonBaseTile, CargoHoldTile, MotorBaseTile, ShieldTile, StructuralModuleTile, VitalSupportTile
public class Tile extends Object implements Serializable
This class represent a generic tile that will be used for the building of the ship.

  • Constructor Details

    • Tile

      public Tile(String image, ConnectorType topType, ConnectorType rightType, ConnectorType bottomType, ConnectorType leftType) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Builder method of the tile
      Parameters:
      topType - Indicates the type of the connector positioned on the top side of the card.
      rightType - Indicates the type of the connector positioned on the right side of the card.
      bottomType - Indicates the type of the connector positioned on the bottom side of the card.
      leftType - Indicates the type of the connector positioned on the left side of the card.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException

    • rotateMultiple

      public void rotateMultiple(int times)
      Rotates the tile by a given number of 90째 clockwise rotations. For example, rotateMultiple(3) rotates the tile 270째 clockwise.
      Parameters:
      times - the number of 90째 clockwise rotations.
